mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reader ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reader ( name, gender, class_dept, reader_type, contact, borrow_limit, borrowed_count, username, password ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{gender}, #{classDept}, #{readerType}, #{contact}, #{borrowLimit}, #{borrowedCount}, #{username}, #{password} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reader SET name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, class_dept = #{classDept}, reader_type = #{readerType}, contact = #{contact}, borrow_limit = #{borrowLimit}, borrowed_count = #{borrowedCount}, username = #{username}, password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
